|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeagleBone AI |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM5729;AM5729BABCXEAR; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC16G-TB29; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D2516EC4BXGGB-U; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.04;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.108;Debian 10.3;
|exp_if_types = Micro SD Card slot, USB 3.0 (Type C), USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 3-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J42 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro HDMI 1.4a, Bluetooth 4.2, UART, I2C, SPI, heatsink |addchip = PMIC for ARM (Cortex-A15);TI;TPS659037;;1;,,, Resistive Touchscreen Controller w/ 8-bit GPIP Expander;STMicro;STMPE811;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC1G08;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;1;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, Programmable-Delay Supervisory Circuit;TI;TPS3808;;1;,,, 60V PNP Small Signal Transistor;Diodes;MMBT2907A;;3;,,, USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 Combo Switch;Pericom;PI3USB3102;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC2G241;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2051BDGN;;1;,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC1G07;;2;,,, Dual Channel EMI Filter w/ int. ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF2USB;;2;,,, Dual Channel EMI Filter w/ int. ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF2HDMI;;2;,,, USB Type-C Configuration Channel Logic & Port Control;TI;TUSB322I;;1;,,, Low-Voltage Adjustable Precision Shunt Regulator;TI;TLVH431;;2;,,, 300mA Low Dropout RF Linear Regulator;SGMicro;SGM2032;;1;,,, 200mA 50V N-Channel Power MOSFET;ON Semi;BSS138L;;1;,,, 115mA 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;2N7002;;1;,,, 20V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;VIshay;Si1902CDL;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |defaultssid = Beaglebone-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^BeagleBone-[A-F0-9]{4}$, |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2019 |estprice = 118 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07YR1RV64 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CM256SM |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYP43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] ''Sitara'' AM5729 (AM5729BABCXEAR) :2x ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.5GHz, 2x ARM (Cortex-M4) @212MHz <!-- :2x Dual Core Programmable Real-Time Unit and Industrial Communication SubSystem (@200MHz) :4x Embedded Vision Engines, 2x C66x floating-point VLIW DSPs (@700MHz) --> *GPU: ''PowerVR'' SGX544MP2 (OpenGL ES2.0, OpenCL, DX10.1) :VPU: with 4K H264 encoding/decoding *RAM: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Storage: 16GB (eMMC) flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *Wi-Fi: [[AzureWave]] Dual-band 802.11ac *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port, 1x USB (Type-C) for :power and superspeed dual-role controller *Power Source: USB (Type-C) port
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BeagleBoard#BeagleBone ''BeagleBone'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/beaglebone-ai-board-ships-with-eve-machine-learning-cores/ ''BeagleBone AI board ships with EVE machine learning cores'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/the-new-beaglebone-ai-b3eea55e09f2 ''The New BeagleBone AI'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/09/20/buy-beaglebone-ai-sbc-ai-edge-applications/ ''BeagleBone-AI SBC is Made for AI Edge Applications'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
